server

Class LANServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server
      • server.LANServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.EndPoint, java.lang.Runnable

    public class LANServer
extends com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server
    LANServer manages all the communication with the LANClient and the game organisation.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • LANServer

        public LANServer(java.io.File gamedirectory)
        Creates the LANServer.

        All listeners and classes for KryoNet get registered. The ServerSettings are loaded, the server port gets binded, the gamelist gets loaded. It is for a valid gamepath checked.

        Parameters:
        gamedirectory - directory, where all packed gamefiles are
        Since:
        1.0
